description:
Try the game Tacticus FOR FREE on Android and iPhones here - Code SQUIDVEMBER for some extra Gold and a Requisition Order:
https://play.tacticusgame.com/squidmar-bloodangels

This week, we paint a Warhammer 40k Blood Angels army, and teach you all about the Death Company color scheme. Everything you need to know to paint your warhammer like a god.
______________

🖌🎨 You can now get the Paint sets, Wet Palette and Airbrush here🎨🖌 
https://harderairbrush.com/pages/squidmar-release-2024-inf

____________________
🏆 Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/squidmarminiatures 
👍 Squidmars website for full list of gear I use: https://www.squidmar.com/gear  

_____________________

Emil On 
Instagram http://www.instagram.com/squidmarminiatures
facebook  http://www.facebook.com/ageofsquidmar

Videos edited by Maxime Dader & Viktor Westermark
title: How to paint the most difficult Warhammer 40k Army - Blood Angels
